author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Nutritious raw veg and carb-rich rice make this an awesome on-the-go lunch.
name: Veggie Sushi Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs ginger root, peeled and grated

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the rice and place in a pan on the hob. Cover with water and bring to the boil. Turn down the heat and simmer, covered, for around 30 minutes until soft. Drain, rinse under cold water, and leave to one side.
Prepare the dressing by combining the oils, tamari, honey, vinegar, ginger, and garlic in a small bowl. Whisk and set aside.
Leaving the skins on, prepare your vegetables. Create cucumber and carrot “spirals” with a spiralizing machine (or you can grate them if you wish).
Peel the avocado and slice the flesh.
Arrange the rice, raw veg, avocado, and seaweed in a bowl. Sprinkle with spring onions and sesame seeds, and drizzle with the tamari and ginger dressing.
